module.name: humanStructure
module.description: This module takes as input an image and 2D skeleton data and outputs sorted blobs around their faces.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause License.
module.description-long: This module takes as input an image and 2D skeleton data from yarpOpenPose and outputs sorted blobs around their faces. Skeleton data are used to define blobs, whose corners are extracted from right ear and left ear keypoints (if one of the two is not detected, the nose is used). Only skeletons with valid nose keypoints are considered, to avoid sending backward oriented faces. Detected blobs are finally sorted from left to right to avoid confusion in case of occlusion (yarpOpenPose outputs an unsorted list of 2D skeletons).

param.desc: The module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name.

input.description: Receives the 2D input skeletons. To be connected to \yarpOpenPose\target:o.
Receives the input image. To be connected to \yarpOpenPose\propag:o.

output.description: Streams out the input image with blobs around the detected faces.
Streams out blobs' coordinates around detected faces as top left and bottom right corners.
